meanings.definition: To look forward to the probable occurrence or appearance of
meanings.sent1: She is expecting a visit from her friend tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: I am expecting a package to arrive today.
meanings.sent3: The cat is expecting the sound of the treat bag to mean snack time.
meanings.sent4: The farmer is expecting a bountiful harvest after a season of hard work.
meanings.sent5: The children are expecting a magical surprise at the birthday party.

meanings.definition: To anticipate or look forward to the coming or occurrence of
meanings.sent1: He is expecting good news about his job interview.
meanings.sent2: We are expecting a baby in the spring.
meanings.sent3: The dog is expecting a walk as soon as the leash is picked up.
meanings.sent4: The students are expecting a challenging test next week.
meanings.sent5: The audience is expecting an exciting performance from the talented singer.
